Title: Bosch GRT 18V-33 18V Professional Cordless Brushless Grass Trimmer Strimmer
Description:
The GRT 18V-33 Professional is a battery trimmer with a powerful, brushless motor for high performance, increased run time and longer life.

You can manually adjust the engine speed to current working conditions to optimize run time.

Electronic speed control keeps the speed constant to maintain even trimming performance.

The Bosch Anti-Tangle feature provides more even trimming, preventing jamming caused by long grass or weeds wrapped around the shaft.

The well-balanced, lightweight design and low noise level support effortless work.

The durable Pro-Tap system with EasyWind for quick wire feed provides a cutting diameter of 33 cm.

The plant protection bracket provides a neat finish at edges while protecting valuable trees and plants.

The GRT 18V-33 Professional is the perfect solution for trimming long grass in medium to large gardens and getting rid of weeds in the driveway.

It is compatible with all batteries and chargers in the Bosch Professional 18V System.

It is equipped with a durable, aluminum motor housing and comes with a practical shoulder strap.
 
User Benefits
 
High-performance grass trimmer for effortless working
Powerful, brushless motor supports high performance, more runtime, and a longer service life
Best work results thanks to its electronic regulation for constant cutting speed, even under load
Faster and uninterrupted trimming without blockages thanks to the Bosch Anti-Tangle feature
Well-balanced, lightweight design and low noise level support effortless working
 
Includes

1 x shoulder strap F 016 L72 340
 
Bare Tool - No Battery or Charger Supplied
